# Odd Command line

First ticket of blog for the wired list command line.

source .bash_history

Execute commands from a file in the current shell. More information: https://manned.org/sourceopen in new window. [1]

Effect

Execute last history commands on the system.

Mar 09, 2023

[1] : https://tldr.inbrowser.app/pages/common/source
